title: Add event logging for transitive reduction fixes
description:
When validate --fix removes redundant dependencies via transitive reduction, it should log events for audit trail.

Current: No events logged when dependencies are automatically removed.

Needed:
- Add Event::DependencyReduced variant with fields: issue_id, old_count, new_count, removed_deps
- OR add generic Event::Custom variant for extensibility
- Update fix_transitive_reduction() in validate.rs to log events
- Add test verifying events are logged

Benefits:
- Complete audit trail of automated changes
- Better observability for agent coordination
- Consistent with other dependency operations (add/remove already log events)

References: docs/session-2025-12-21-short-hash-progress.md (Issue #1)
